javadoc:
Splash screen window to display version information about the current release of
 the Ghidra application. The window is displayed when Ghidra starts; when
 initialization is complete, the splash screen is dismissed.

methods.javadoc:
Show the splash screen; displayed only when Ghidra is first coming up
@return the new splash screen
methods.name: showSplashScreen
methods.comment: Show the splash screen; displayed only when Ghidra is first coming up

methods.javadoc: Remove the splash screen; Ghidra is done loading.
methods.name: disposeSplashScreen
methods.comment: Remove the splash screen; Ghidra is done loading.

methods.javadoc:
Update the load status on the splash screen.
@param status string to put in the message area of the splash screen
methods.name: updateSplashScreenStatus
methods.comment: Update the load status on the splash screen.

params.name: status
params.comment: string to put in the message area of the splash screen

name: SplashScreen
comment:
Splash screen window to display version information about the current release of
 the Ghidra application. The window is displayed when Ghidra starts; when
 initialization is complete, the splash screen is dismissed.
